text: haey avei del now leumekh cheachraen chean ning avei del now leu phendei kuchea kammosetthi robsa a l laoh . haey pitabrakd nasa yeung ban bangkeab brae dl banda anak delke ban phdal kompir aoy moun puok anak ning puok anak aoy kaotakhlach a l laoh . te brasenbae puok anak brachheang vinh pitabrakd nasa avei del now leumekh cheachraen chean ning avei del now leu phendei kuchea kammosetthi robsa a l laoh . haey a l laoh mean avei krobyeang chea ti kaotasarsaer bamphot
